content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case is about the payment of costs and it started on august 26 2016 and ended on january 6 2017 the responsible party for the costs is being compensated the final resolution of the case involves dividing the goods between the exspouses the total value of the goods is 9026600 eur the real estate is divided equally between the plaintiff and the defendants the decision in this case is based on a specific law called the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the court settlement is confidential so the details cannot be disclosed there is no translation available for this document

metadata.CASE_ID: Okrožno sodišče v Ljubljani, settlement P 1819/2016-I, 6. 1. 2017
